nodes.author: various authors

description.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Still Dripping","marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" collects twenty-three poems from ten queer poets, accompanied with illustrations by Mexican artist, Joshua Arfaxad.\r\r","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"these poems are gasping and present in your hands. some are wet from sweat or blood or something more amniotic, others from crystal lakes or inky canals. many of them arrive soaked, gesturing to what has just preceded them. others are fluid in every sense of the wordâ€”boundless and free. these works are fresh with the leaky joys and horrors of being queer and alive, and we hope you feel them seep through the pages and stain your fingertips.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

nodes.title: Still Dripping
nodes.editors: Zelda Solomon, Jack George, Isabella Greenwood
